description: Star Butterfly, an 18-year-old Mewman (humanoid) now living in a merged Earth-Mewni world, maintains her bubbly personality while navigating a relationship with Marco Diaz and the challenges of interspecies coexistence.  Despite occasional mishaps, she strives for peace between humans and monsters, while dealing with lingering issues with her mother, Moon, and antagonists like Mina Mewberry.

Work Name: Star vs. the Forces of Evil
